title: [K-12] Short-Term Course for Enhancing Elementary Mathematics Teachers' Competencies Using Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education theories and fundamental smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Course focused on developing mobile-based mathematics pedagogies applicable in real classrooms. Content creation and collaboration must be achievable via smartphones in PC-unavailable environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized math problem sets using mobile applications.

Learners will develop three or more 10-minute math lesson scenarios reflecting real classroom environments (e.g., split classes, group activities) using mobile devices (tablets/smartphones) within one week and achieve at least 3 points out of 5 on a peer evaluation rubric (content relevance, technology utilization, creativity).
Learners can share mobile lesson materials with peer teachers and provide feedback via a collaborative platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
